de.uzk.hki.da.grid

Interface GridFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FakeGridFacade, IrodsFederatedGridFacade, IrodsGridFacade, IrodsGridFacadeBase

    public interface GridFacade
    The Interface GridFacade.
    Author:
    Jens Peters The Interface to operate with DataGrid Software Systems in decoupled environments. Seperates the DataGrid operations from the archival workflow done before. Should be used as unique point for Ingestion and Retrieval to the Data Grid.

    • Method Detail

      • put

        boolean put(File file,
          String gridPath,
          StoragePolicy sp)
            throws IOException
        Asynchronous call. Puts a file from the local file system into the grid.
        Parameters:
        file - full path to a file location which should be ingested into the grid
        gridPath - address of the target file name in grid (excluding zone prefix) If @param gridPath parent Folder does not exist, it will be created.
        Returns:
        true if file has been successfully copied to the grid cache area, the file has been successfully registered at the working resource and the replication command has been fired.
        false if one of the abovementioned conditions has not been met. put can be called again after returning false.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case grid file already exists and has already lza repls. In this case we interpret the call of put as beeing malicious. This is the case when calling put after put has been already called and returned true. Store file on the DataGrid, replicate to repl_dests Returns true, if the store and delegation of replication process succeeds.

      • get

        void get(File destination,
       String gridFileAdress)
         throws IOException
        Retrieve file from the DataGrid.
        Parameters:
        destination - full path to a file location the retrieved object gets written to. destination should not point to a folder.
        gridFileAdress - address of source file in grid (excluding zone prefix)
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(String gridFileAddress)
        Determine if a file is valid on the Grid. The Data Grid SW has to perform the necessary checks to fulfill this requirement.
        Parameters:
        gridFileAddress - address of source file in grid (excluding zone prefix)
        Returns:
        true, if is valid

      • storagePolicyAchieved

        boolean storagePolicyAchieved(String gridPath,
                            StoragePolicy sp)
        Determines if the given storage Policy is being achieved.
        Parameters:
        address_dest - the address_dest
        minNodes - the min nodes
        Returns:
        true, if successful
